MAN.TITLE: iconvert
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: conversion to 1 or 4 byte integer representation

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : matrix of integers coded on one, two or four bytes.

DESCRIPTION.P: converts and stores data two one, two or four bytes integers.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: : return int8 numbers in the range [-128,127]
: return uint8 numbers in the range [0,255]
: return int16 numbers in the range [-32768,32767]
: return uint16 numbers in the range [0, 65535]
: return int32 numbers in the range [-2147483648,2147483647]
: return uint32 numbers in the range [0, 4294967295]
